positions.title: Associate Engineering Manager
summary: As the engineering manager, I plan our biweekly sprints, refine our backlog, scope long-term epics, and supervise individual contributors on the team directly.
As an individual contributor, I am tasked with architecting our data observability pipelines using Elementary, dbt, and Hex to monitor and report on the health of our data warehouse at a macro level.

positions.title: Data Engineer
summary: In this role I collaborated in executing numerous technical projects, including a warehouse migration from AWS to GCP, adopting dbt and Docker to our tech stack, and converting dozens of one-off ELT pipelines into a suite of reusable Python operators.

positions.title: Software Engineer
summary: I provided engineering support to multiple programs during the Midterm Elections. In various projects I built and deployed a GIS interface to enable custom reporting, developed site reliability automations, built a core data model for peer-to-peer contacts in dbt, and enabled robust reporting

positions.title: Lab Manager + Research Engineer
summary: As the lab manager, I facilitated day-to-day operations of the lab, including expense tracking, hiring, and participant recruitment and compensation.
As the research engineer, I developed a Python package to model fMRI analyses in a templated fashion (GLM Express), and designed a Flask UI to automate the completion of common expense forms.

company: Social Cognitive and Neural Sciences Lab

positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant
summary: In addition to facilitating participant recruitment and compensation, I contributed to the lab's codebase by designing templated study stimuli generation scripts and an automated email reminder system for study partcipants.
